stories.original_headline: A hidden magnetic order could unlock superconductivity
stories.original_summary: Physicists have discovered that hidden magnetic order plays a key role in the pseudogap, a puzzling state of matter that appears just before certain materials become superconductors. Using an ultra-cold quantum simulator, the team found that even when magnetism seems disrupted, subtle and universal
stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Uncover Hidden Magic for Potent Enchantments!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a secret: a hidden magical order helps materials reach potent enchantment. Using their arcane devices, they found that even when magic seems chaotic, subtle energies guide certain rare metals into a state of powerful flow, just before they become truly magnificent. This discovery could unlock wonders for the kingdom.

stories.original_headline: TikTok is still down, here are all the latest updates
stories.original_summary: More than a day after TikTok’s issues began, TikTok USDS says the problems are the result of a power outage at a data center and subsequent cascading systems failure. Starting early Sunday morning, TikTok’s now under new ownership US arm started breaking down just a couple of days after Oracle & Co
stories.fantasy_headline: Whispering Mirrors Fall Silent After Leyline Disturbance!
stories.fantasy_story: For over a day, the Grand Archive of Whispers has been dormant. The Whispering Mirror Guild reports a severe magical disturbance from their main Crystal Scrying Pool, causing a cascade of failures. This silence comes just after the Elder Scribes' Clan acquired the Western Reaches branch, leaving many without their daily glimpses.
